title: As a user I want to see a warning on a MN Reinstate from DL (for Concussion) if the player is on option
custom_steps:
Messages #91: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/DL+-+Messages

Business Rules #20.12.1: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/20.+Reinstate+from+DL

Flags: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/23.+DL+Flags

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" on a MN Reinstate from DL transaction will check to see if the player is also currently on Option. 
* If yes, and the player is being reinstated from a DL placement that includes a concussion, then display Messages #91. 
* A flag should also appear on the BOC Approvals widget.

* If yes, and the player is being transferred to the 60 Day DL for a concussion, then display Messages #90. 
* A flag should also appear on the BOC Approvals widget.

title: As a user I want to see an error if I do not enter comments on a MN 60 Day DL placement that has an Injury reason of "Other"
custom_steps:
Messages #92: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/DL+-+Messages

Business Rules #15.11.2: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/15.+Place+on+60-Day+DL

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" on a MN Place on 60 Day DL transaction will check to see if any of the Injury Description or Ailment fields have been set to "Other". 
* If yes, display Messages #92. 
* This error should be overrideable for Clubs if comments have been entered, otherwise it is a hard error for them. 
* This error should always be overrideable for the BOC.

title: As a user I want to see an error if I do not enter comments on a MN 7 Day DL placement that has an Injury reason of "Other"
custom_steps:
Messages #92: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/DL+-+Messages

Business Rules #14.11.2: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/14.+Place+on+7-Day+DL

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" on a MN Place on 7 Day DL transaction will check to see if any of the Injury Description or Ailment fields have been set to "Other". 
* If yes, display Messages #92. 
* This error should be overrideable for Clubs if comments have been entered, otherwise it is a hard error for them. 
* This error should always be overrideable for the BOC.

title: As a user I want to see an error if I do not enter comments explaining an exam date more than 10 days old on a MN transfer to 60 Day DL transaction
custom_steps:
Messages #7: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/DL+-+Messages

Business Rules #1.10: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/1.+Verify+DL+Placement+Date

Acceptance Criteria: 
*This is an amendment to the current rule that is always a hard error for Clubs to allow them to proceed if they explain the reason in the comments*
* Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" on a MN Transfer to 60 Day DL transaction will check to see if the exam date entered is more than 10 days in the past. 
* If yes, display Messages #7. 
* This error should be overrideable for Clubs if comments have been entered, otherwise it is a hard error for them. 
* This error should always be overrideable for the BOC. 
* This change to the MN League DL should not be reflected on the MJ League placements.

title: As a BOC Approver, I want to see a flag for MN DL Transfers that have comments entered
custom_steps:
Flags: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/23.+DL+Flags

Acceptance Criteria: 
* If comments exist on a MN Transfer to 60 Day DL then the BOC should see a flag indicating that comments were entered on the Approvals clipboard.

title: As a BOC Approver, I want to see a flag for MN DL Placements that have comments entered
custom_steps:
Flags: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/23.+DL+Flags

Acceptance Criteria: 
* If comments exist on a MN Place on 60 Day DL then the BOC should see a flag indicating that comments were entered on the Approvals clipboard. 
* If comments exist on a MN Place on 7 Day DL then the BOC should see a flag indicating that comments were entered on the Approvals clipboard.
